name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Frank John SHROYER, Petitioner
docket_number: Petition No. 010 Middle District Allocatur Docket 2000

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Frank John SHROYER, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 28th day of April, 2000, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The order of the Superi- or Court is hereby REVERSED. The case is remanded to the Court of Common Pleas of Huntingdon County for consideration of the Post Conviction Relief Act petition on its merits.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
750 A.2d 822
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Frank John SHROYER, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 28, 2000.
